tempMessages.author: apple
tempMessages.message: Hello world! This is a long message that will hopefully get wrapped by our message bubble component! We will see how well it works.

tempMessages.author: orange
tempMessages.message: It looks like it wraps exactly as it is supposed to. Lets see what a reply looks like!
